lines.text: I need your truck.
You're not taking my truck.
[Mason cocks his gun]
How far you got to go?
We're heroes, my man. It's time to start acting like it. Quit limping around like that.
Excuse me, I got a bullet in my leg.
Always the negative with you.
You just hijacked me with an unloaded gun?
Yeah.
When this is all over, remind me to kick your ass!
Don't worry, I'm a professional, this won't hurt a bit
Well, I am an amateur! This is gonna hurt like hell!
That's a very, very nice walkie-talkie you have there.
Why? You're nothing, nobody! Why?
You'd never understand.
I would have in another life. They took all that away and left me with nothing. But now I have it all.
Listen, Arlo...

[Vaughn punches Tim]
Hey!
Shut your mouth!
It won't be long now, gentlemen. And it won't be very pleasant.
[Brynner puts a small sample of Elvis on the road by Tim and Arlo for testing]
But such is the price of patriotism.
